Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

I'm using Mechjeb 2.5.3 but can't spot the rendezvous option in the selection of functions after installing the mod and adding the ability to a ship.

Just wondering what I'm doing wrong as I'd love to get rendezvous to work.

Do I need an earlier version of Mechjeb?

Thanks.

Edited September 6, 2015 by guitar6251
Answer given.

When playing career or science mode you first need to unlock the relevant tech-node before it becomes available.

(Also: Since this is purely mod related I guess General Add-on Affairs would have been a better place to ask this question.)

Edited September 7, 2015 by Claw

Let's try starting over again, because this has been happening a bit on the forums and it's not necessary. I don't believe anyone was trying to be angry or take umbrage, but merely trying to offer two bits of help. In the context of "text only" communication, it's easy to misconstrue intent by either party. So I'm going to chalk it up to that. I've deleted some posts and also edited Tex's post to show how word arrangement (with the same info) can convey different intent. So take that as a case in point. I'm not pointing blame here, simply providing an example.

So, that aside... Yes, indeed. If you are playing on career, MechJeb is set up such that you gain more and more access by unlocking the tech tree. So that would be the first bit of info that we need to know.

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw

Edited September 7, 2015 by Claw
